grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 15/35 – 43.7% completion. Lower completion indicates less thoroughness and self-awareness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 2.0/2 – Strong technical foundation with relevant skills for target field (e.g., machine learning, prompt engineering, data analysis).
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.5/3 – 1 solid internship + projects OR 2+ well-described projects with real-world applications.
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 0.5/2 – Limited indicators of leadership or professional development.

strongest_assets: Solid technical skills demonstrated through certifications, academic projects and internships.
Relevant hobbies and interests in AI technologies.
development_areas: Expanding the range of programming languages and tools, improving leadership roles and extra-curricular activities.
hiring_insights.industry_readiness: The candidate shows moderate to good industry readiness but may require additional training in some technical areas to ensure optimal performance.

grading_debug.notes: The candidate demonstrates a solid technical foundation and hands-on experience, but limited leadership potential and growth indicators. With some additional development in those areas, this candidate could become an attractive hire.
